meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: The Israeli and Palestinian leaders agreed to maintain field-level security coordination that Israel had threatened to sever after an Israeli officer was killed.
Negotiators struggled to clinch a deal on a treaty to reduce emissions of greenhouse gases, with many hopeful that at least a general agreement could be reached.
The Israeli and Palestinian leaders agreed to maintain field-level security coordination that Israel had threatened to sever after an Israeli officer was killed.
Negotiators struggled to clinch a deal on a treaty to reduce emissions of greenhouse gases, with many hopeful that at least a general agreement could be reached.
An estimated 5.3 million people, including 600,000 children under 15, have been infected this year with the virus that causes AIDS, the World Health Organization said.
Scientists have found a way to build and propel microbe-size motors, called nanomachines, that some say could one day power miniature robots to repair cells.
